activitySummary: The user is actively engaged in a group chat on Gmail with members Phil, Bogdan, Simon, and Shawn. The conversation revolves around the GT School's budget for Q3'24, with specific attention to marketing-related costs and AI vendor expenses. Simon is asking Isaac for a rough idea of the marketing spend for the quarter and whether it has been discussed with Samy for TeachTales. The user is also managing tasks on the right side of the screen, which include various work-related items such as Mac build working on Steam, splitting out content generation, and prompt engineering.

The user has a task list open on the right side of the screen, which includes tasks like 'Mac build working on Steam?', 'Tablet for Phil's son', 'Split out content gen / prompt engineering', 'Do we grow marketing team?', 'Q2 progress / Q3 plan Budget meeting', 'Samy 1:1 topics - App testing as a service - Doreen run research study', 'Weekly update', 'Enter grade (support US grades only)', 'Post TeachTap content on TikTok following the unit schedule on the calendar Split by channel per AP course', and 'Follow up with Doreen about beta program and research study'. The user is likely organizing and prioritizing these tasks.
